title: A missing scientist for over 20 years was found living inside a secret LSD drug lab hidden in the basement.
subtitle: Fake news reports that a scientist who has been missing for over 20 years has been found living in a secret drug lab in the basement of a couple from Minnesota.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A missing scientist has been found for over 20 years living in a secret drug lab in the basement of a couple from Minnesota.
